home.subtitle: The all-in-one tool that supports all Sendcloud sales. Your passepartout for calculators, quotes, pricing and much more.

coralBay.title: Coral Bay transforms 84% of orders into positive reviews with Sendcloud's automatic WhatsApp
coralBay.aboutText: Coral Bay was born in 2010 from the twenty-year experience of the ownership in the aquarium market, initially in greenhouses and in direct contact with importers, then landing as a retail store. The company specializes in selling aquariums, technical equipment, freshwater and marine fish, also offering aquarium assistance and maintenance services.
coralBay.founderQuote: Coral Bay is passion, expertise, quality and innovation.
coralBay.challengeText1: Before starting its journey with Sendcloud, Coral Bay managed review collection directly from its website. The procedure consisted of having reviews left directly via email after filling out a form.
coralBay.challengeText2: The lack of immediacy and the existence of too many steps to reach the review had prevented Coral Bay from exceeding an 8% conversion rate, a figure that could certainly be improved with the insertion of a fluid tool capable of incentivizing and automating the request.
coralBay.resultsText1: Having acknowledged the area for improvement that could be exploited to grow its business, Coral Bay, thanks to the implementation of Sendcloud within its e-commerce, has managed to build a true post-sales strategy aimed at collecting and growing reviews.
coralBay.resultsText2: Specifically, Coral Bay has included a link to get reviews within its transactional WhatsApp messages, finding a point of contact with customers within one of the most effective communication channels in the world and thus also increasing its SEO positioning.
coralBay.extraordinaryResultsText: With this quick fix, Coral Bay has collected 328 positive reviews on Google My Business, reaching a score of 4.3 stars. The conversion rate has increased from 8% to 84% after the implementation of Sendcloud.
coralBay.importanceOfReviewsText: The latest Bright Local report on the relationship between consumers and reviews speaks clearly: 84% of the people interviewed consider reading reviews "very important" for their purchasing decision.
coralBay.exponentialGrowthText1: At the time of writing this case study, Coral Bay has sent a WhatsApp review request for each of the shipments managed with Sendcloud. The result? It has converted 84% of its orders into positive reviews, an amazing figure that exceeds any industry estimate.
coralBay.exponentialGrowthText2: The graph shows the drastic increase in the percentage of orders converted into reviews since the beginning of using Sendcloud, going from a conversion rate of 8% to 84%.
coralBay.whatsappTemplateText1: One of the key elements of Coral Bay's success was the personalized WhatsApp template used to request reviews from customers. The message was designed to be:
coralBay.whatsappTemplateText2: This approach allowed to drastically simplify the review collection process, eliminating the obstacles that previously limited the conversion rate to 8%.
coralBay.templatePoint1: Personal, addressing the customer directly by name
coralBay.templatePoint2: Concise, requiring only two minutes of the customer's time
coralBay.templatePoint3: Direct, with a clear link to leave the review
coralBay.templatePoint4: Cordial, thanking the customer for their purchase
coralBay.ctaTitle: Want to increase your reviews with WhatsApp?
coralBay.ctaText: Discover how Sendcloud can help you automate customer communications and significantly increase the number of positive reviews for your e-commerce.
coralBay.benefit1Text: Increase in conversion rate from 8% to 84%, transforming most orders into positive reviews.
coralBay.benefit2Text: Use of WhatsApp as a direct and immediate channel for review requests, eliminating the superfluous steps of the previous process.
coralBay.benefit3Text: Collection of 328 positive reviews with a score of 4.3 stars, significantly improving online visibility and reputation.

curaFarma.title: How Cura Pharmacy went from 3 to 309 reviews using Sendcloud's WhatsApp for 3 months
curaFarma.aboutText: Cura Pharmacy was born in 2015 from a branch of Cavallaro s.r.l., a company for importing and reselling medical-surgical devices, health devices and drugs, which has existed on the market since 1958. The ambition and entrepreneurial spirit of the Palmieri brothers, the founders of Cura Pharmacy, have provided the young company with the necessary drive to establish itself in a competitive market with excellent quality products.
curaFarma.founderQuote: Customer care is the company's priority mission. It couldn't be otherwise: for Cura Pharmacy, 'Care' is in the name.
curaFarma.challengeText: Before adopting Sendcloud, Cura Pharmacy did not have an effective system for collecting reviews from its customers. The lack of such a process meant that Cura Pharmacy could not fully exploit the potential of customer feedback to improve its offering and increase trust among potential buyers.
curaFarma.resultsText1: Cura Pharmacy also decided to adopt the same strategy used by hundreds of Sendcloud customers: sending a WhatsApp review request message one day after package delivery.
curaFarma.resultsText2: On the advice of the Sendcloud consultant, to increase the message conversion rate, it was decided to insert the review request link in a CTA button at the bottom of the personalized template.
curaFarma.extraordinaryResultsText: The adoption of Sendcloud led to surprising results for Cura Pharmacy. In just 90 days, the number of reviews received went from 3 to 309, recording a percentage increase of 10,200%.
curaFarma.whatsappEffectivenessText: According to the latest Global Digital Report, WhatsApp API messages have an extraordinary open rate of 99% and a response rate of 50%.
curaFarma.exponentialGrowthText1: The graph clearly shows the exponential increase in reviews achieved by Cura Pharmacy in 90 days, keeping the average rating constant at a value of 4.8.
curaFarma.exponentialGrowthText2: This rapid growth allowed Cura Pharmacy to gain greater market visibility and constantly improve its products and services thanks to feedback received from customers.
curaFarma.futureProspectsText1: Finally, a very eloquent last piece of data should be noted: the link contained within Cura Pharmacy's WhatsApp message was clicked in 22% of cases.
curaFarma.futureProspectsText2: Recording such an important click rate is indicative of the impact that a marketing campaign can have using this tool.
curaFarma.ctaTitle: Want to increase your reviews with WhatsApp?
curaFarma.ctaText: Discover how Sendcloud can help you automate customer communications and significantly increase the number of positive reviews for your e-commerce.
curaFarma.benefit1Text: 10,200% increase in the number of reviews in just 90 days, going from 3 to 309 verified reviews.
curaFarma.benefit2Text: 22% click rate on WhatsApp messages, demonstrating the effectiveness of this channel for customer engagement.
curaFarma.benefit3Text: Maintaining an average rating of 4.8 out of 5, building a solid online reputation that increases trust among potential customers.

augustoAbbigliamento.title: Augusto Abbigliamento invests â‚¬60 and generates â‚¬1890 in revenue with Sendcloud's WhatsApp
augustoAbbigliamento.aboutText: Augusto Abbigliamento is an Italian sportswear store specialized in outdoor and hiking equipment. Using Sendcloud's services, they managed to transform a small investment into a significant economic return, demonstrating the effectiveness of direct messaging channels for retail in the sports sector.
augustoAbbigliamento.whatsappStrategyText1: We started using Sendcloud to manage our WhatsApp communications with customers. With a minimal investment of just â‚¬60, we managed to generate â‚¬1890 in revenue in a single month.
augustoAbbigliamento.whatsappStrategyText2: The platform allowed us to send personalized messages, promotions and updates directly to our customers, resulting in 27 additional sales we wouldn't have achieved otherwise. The 3050% ROI speaks for itself - this has been one of our most effective marketing strategies.
augustoAbbigliamento.resultsText1: Augusto Abbigliamento's WhatsApp campaign generated extraordinary results, demonstrating the effectiveness of this communication channel for e-commerce.
augustoAbbigliamento.resultsText2: With a budget of just â‚¬60, the company managed to generate 27 new sales for a total revenue of â‚¬1890, achieving an exceptional ROI of 3050%.
augustoAbbigliamento.resultsText3: These results demonstrate how a well-planned post-sales communication strategy can become a powerful business growth tool, stimulating repeat purchases and increasing customer loyalty.
augustoAbbigliamento.ctaTitle: Want to increase your sales with WhatsApp?
augustoAbbigliamento.ctaText: Discover how Sendcloud can help you automate customer communications and significantly increase the number of sales for your e-commerce.
augustoAbbigliamento.benefit1Text: A 3050% return on investment demonstrates the extraordinary effectiveness of WhatsApp campaigns compared to other marketing channels.
augustoAbbigliamento.benefit2Text: WhatsApp allows reaching customers on their preferred channel, with open rates above 95%.
augustoAbbigliamento.benefit3Text: Personalized communications increase customer loyalty and stimulate repeat purchases.

laScarpologa.title: La Scarpologa gets 43 new sales with Sendcloud's WhatsApp
laScarpologa.aboutText: La Scarpologa was born from an idea by Antonella Ritondale, a young and passionate Florentine entrepreneur with 6 years of experience in one of the most important buying offices at national and international level.
laScarpologa.founderQuote: "My collection is sparkling, glamorous and youthful! I love women, their grit and their tenacity. My company is for 'Normal' women and always will be."
laScarpologa.challengeText1: Before being contacted by a Sendcloud specialist, Antonella managed an average of 250 orders per month alone and without automation tools. The implementation of Sendcloud in her processes improved the shop's logistics management, allowing her to handle her shipments more quickly and efficiently, especially thanks to the use of shipping notifications.
laScarpologa.challengeText2: After benefiting from Sendcloud's automations for several months, "La Scarpologa" decided to take a further step forward, getting involved with the Sendcloud team in a project that involved the combined use of various automatic WhatsApp messages to stimulate new sales and receive reviews.
laScarpologa.strategyText1: In the first phase, it was decided to send an automatic message 1 day after package delivery asking for a review in exchange for a gift and a promotional code to be used for a further purchase.
laScarpologa.strategyText2: The goal was to pursue two parallel objectives: increasing reviews to strengthen brand authority and incentivizing a new purchase in the short term, within the next 7 days.
laScarpologa.strategyText3: Sending this message led to 71 reviews and 16 sales within a month, with 250 automatic WhatsApp messages sent and a budget of only 25 euros.
laScarpologa.additionalStrategiesText: Satisfied with the first result, it was decided to test other approaches:
laScarpologa.oneTimeOfferText: Sending an automatic WhatsApp at the exact moment of label generation, offering the possibility to add another pair of shoes to the outgoing shipment with a special discount.
laScarpologa.seasonalCouponText: Mass sending to all customers who participated in Black Friday of a WhatsApp with a special coupon valid on the new Christmas collection.
laScarpologa.additionalResults: The adoption of these two simple WhatsApp messages at precise moments in the post-sale phase generated another 27 sales.
laScarpologa.resultsText: In summary, the combination of strategies used by "La Scarpologa" in the last two months ensured that, for a negligible cost, just over 600 WhatsApp messages turned into 43 new sales with a total value of â‚¬1935.
laScarpologa.ctaTitle: Want to increase your sales with WhatsApp?
laScarpologa.ctaText: Discover how Sendcloud can help you automate customer communications and significantly increase the number of sales for your e-commerce.
laScarpologa.benefit1Text: A minimal investment of â‚¬61.70 generated â‚¬1935 in revenue, demonstrating the extraordinary effectiveness of WhatsApp campaigns compared to other marketing channels.
laScarpologa.benefit2Text: WhatsApp allows reaching customers on their preferred channel, with open rates above 95% and a conversion rate of 6%.
laScarpologa.benefit3Text: Personalized communications at strategic moments in the customer journey increase customer loyalty and stimulate repeat purchases.

ivanBasile.title: Ivan Basile collects 49 positive reviews in 35 days with Sendcloud's automatic WhatsApp
ivanBasile.aboutText: Ivan Basile is an Italian brand that creates bracelets, necklaces, Tibetan malas and trouser chains in semi-precious hard stone: all customized to their customers' style.
ivanBasile.founderQuote: "One day I thought how beautiful it would be to create a stone bracelet for myself, but not the one I had always seen in shop windows, not the one I had seen in advertisements on someone else's wrist, but a unique bracelet, made to measure, with the colors and stones I desired."
ivanBasile.challengeText1: Before Sendcloud, Ivan and his collaborators managed an average of 400 monthly orders without any automation tools.
ivanBasile.challengeText2: The procedure consisted of logging into the Bartolini Easysped Web portal, filling in the relevant fields by copying and pasting the package recipient's data, fulfilling orders on Shopify and entering the relevant tracking for each order to allow their customers to track the shipment.
ivanBasile.challengeText3: Furthermore, until that moment the shop's Google My Business account had 17 reviews collected over 1 year: numbers that could definitely be improved considering the volume of shipments made by the e-commerce every month.
ivanBasile.progressText1: Ivan and his team decided to try Sendcloud to manage their e-commerce shipments. From a manual copy and paste system, they moved to creating an average of 20 labels per day in just a few seconds.
ivanBasile.progressText2: Not only that, once the shipping labels were printed, Sendcloud automatically fulfilled every single Shopify order, updating customers on the shipment status through personalized emails and WhatsApp messages.
ivanBasile.reviewsExplosionText: However, the real turning point of Ivan's experience with the platform was something else. Ivan decided to apply a post-sale strategy that allowed him to automatically send a second WhatsApp after package delivery.
ivanBasile.immediateResultsText: With this simple modification, Ivan Basile collected 17 positive reviews on Google My Business: all after just 12 days from its application. To achieve the same result without Sendcloud had taken 12 months.
ivanBasile.importanceOfReviewsText: A study by Capterra Italia found that 90% of Italians read online reviews before buying from an e-commerce, compared to a European average of 62%.
ivanBasile.exponentialGrowthText1: At the time of writing this case study, Ivan Basile has sent a review request WhatsApp for each of the 147 shipments managed with Sendcloud.
ivanBasile.exponentialGrowthText2: The result? He quadrupled his positive reviews, bringing them from 17 to 66 within 36 days. Currently, the conversion rate from shipments to reviews stands at 33%, a figure significantly above the industry average.
ivanBasile.futureProspectsText1: Considering June's conversion rate and an average of 350 monthly orders, it is estimated that Ivan Basile's shop could obtain between 1300 and 1500 reviews over the course of a year with Sendcloud, net of physiological fluctuations in the conversion rate.
ivanBasile.futureProspectsText2: This significant increase in positive reviews will not only improve the brand's visibility on search engines, but will also increase potential customers' trust, leading to a probable increase in conversions and overall sales.
ivanBasile.testimonialText: "Beautiful bracelet, arrived in record time. Excellent communication and impeccable customer service. Highly recommended! Thank you Ivan for your professionalism and for helping me choose the perfect stones for me."
ivanBasile.ctaTitle: Want to increase your reviews with WhatsApp?
ivanBasile.ctaText: Discover how Sendcloud can help you automate customer communications and significantly increase the number of positive reviews for your e-commerce.
ivanBasile.benefit1Text: From a manual process to a fully automated system that handles labels, status updates and post-sale communications.
ivanBasile.benefit2Text: Personalized WhatsApp messages that reach customers at the right time, with a 33% conversion rate to reviews.
ivanBasile.benefit3Text: Quadrupling of positive reviews in just over a month, with a significant impact on customer trust and SEO positioning.

createQuote.storeIntegrationText: Connect all your sales channels (WooCommerce, Shopify, Amazon, etc.) into a unified platform. Centralize order management and view all orders directly from your Sendcloud dashboard.
createQuote.carrierIntegrationText: Access all major national and international carriers from a single platform. Eliminate the need to manage multiple contracts and streamline your carrier relationships.
createQuote.discountedShippingRatesText: Benefit from exclusive discounted shipping rates with leading carriers in Italy and internationally. Reduce shipping costs while maintaining reliable delivery services.
createQuote.labelPrintingText: Print all labels with one click and automate your shipping process. Eliminate manual address entry and boost operational efficiency from order fulfillment to dispatch.
createQuote.packAndGoText: Optimize packaging with intelligent technology. Receive automated recommendations that minimize waste, reduce costs, and accelerate fulfillment operations.
createQuote.shipmentMonitoringText: Monitor all shipments in real-time with an interactive dashboard. Track delivery progress and manage exceptions across your shipping network.
createQuote.brandedEmailsText: Send professional branded email notifications at every shipment stage. Maintain consistent brand communication with custom emails featuring your logo and brand identity.
createQuote.whatsappTrackingReviewText: Leverage WhatsApp's 99% open rate to keep customers engaged. Send real-time tracking updates and automated review requests via personalized messages.
createQuote.whatsappMarketingText: Maximize customer lifetime value with post-delivery WhatsApp campaigns. Send targeted follow-up messages with exclusive promotions and discount codes to drive repeat purchases.
createQuote.trackingPageText: Provide customers with a fully branded, personalized tracking experience. Enhance post-purchase satisfaction with a professional tracking page that reflects your brand identity.
createQuote.pudoMapAtCheckoutText: Enable customers to select pickup points directly during checkout. Integrate an interactive PUDO map offering convenient delivery locations and reducing failed deliveries.
createQuote.returnsPortalText: Implement a world-class returns experience matching industry leaders. Provide a seamless self-service portal that simplifies returns and improves customer satisfaction.
createQuote.xcoverInsuranceText: Insure shipments against loss, theft or damage with XCover.com. Cost: 1.02% of sale value for Italy, 2.98% for international shipments.

coltelleriaStore.title: Coltelleria Store wins back 71 customers with Sendcloud WhatsApp messages
coltelleriaStore.aboutText: Coltelleria Store is an online shop specializing in the sale of kitchen knives, collectible knives, and hunting knives. Its goal is to offer customers quality products, selected from the best brands in the industry.
coltelleriaStore.founderQuote: "With our years of experience, we are now a leading company in cutlery sales."
coltelleriaStore.challengeText: Before discovering Sendcloud, Coltelleria Store did not use any automatic post-sale messaging system, although they knew the importance of using WhatsApp in managing an e-commerce business in Italy. According to a study by We Are Social and Hootsuite, WhatsApp is the most used communication channel by Italians and has over 35 million active users per month in our country.
coltelleriaStore.strategyText1: To increase sales and customer loyalty, Coltelleria Store decided to leverage the potential of Sendcloud's 'Conversations' feature, which allows interaction with customers at specific moments in the post-sale phase of e-commerce.
coltelleriaStore.strategyText2: Thanks to Sendcloud, the e-commerce was able to create a post-sale campaign based on a 10% discount code to use on the next purchase. The message was sent one day after package delivery, including the customer's name variable.
coltelleriaStore.resultsText1: With a budget of â‚¬205, Coltelleria Store achieved 71 new sales worth a total of â‚¬2,840, with an ROI of 1385% and a conversion rate of 3.5%.
coltelleriaStore.resultsText2: This data demonstrates that WhatsApp is an extremely effective tool for stimulating sales and increasing average order value. Additionally, sending a message after package delivery helps create a closer relationship with customers and improve their satisfaction.
coltelleriaStore.whyWhatsappText: Coltelleria Store's experience demonstrates that investing in WhatsApp can be much more profitable than investing in other digital channels.
coltelleriaStore.highCoverageText: Almost all Italians have WhatsApp installed on their smartphone and use it daily.
coltelleriaStore.lowCompetitionText: Few companies still use WhatsApp for marketing and this stimulates the attention of message recipients.
coltelleriaStore.highDeliverabilityText: WhatsApp messages always reach the recipient without ending up in spam or being filtered by algorithms.
coltelleriaStore.ctaTitle: Want to win back your customers with WhatsApp?
coltelleriaStore.ctaText: Discover how Sendcloud can help you automate customer communications and significantly increase sales and loyalty for your e-commerce.

rossiRicambi.title: Rossi Ricambi gets +5000 reviews in 7 months and stimulates new purchases with Sendcloud WhatsApp messages
rossiRicambi.aboutText: Rossi Ricambi is a company with over 40 years of experience that deals with the retail sale of spare parts and small appliances, offering online technical assistance and at its headquarters in Messina. It handles more than 100 brands, among the best on the market, sending hundreds of items daily to Italy and abroad.
rossiRicambi.founderQuote: "We founded the company in 1975, with great commitment, professional ethics and hard work. Today, after 40 years of experience, we can offer the highest levels of professionalism and quality for our customers."
rossiRicambi.challengeText: Before Sendcloud, the Rossi Ricambi team managed an average of 1500 monthly orders through a competing automation system. So, although they had successfully automated the purely logistical phases of their shipments, they had never managed to efficiently handle communication with their customers. In 5 years they had in fact collected only 71 reviews.
rossiRicambi.resultsText1: The company then decided to implement Sendcloud to automate communications related to shipments with their customers. After customizing their transactional emails, the shop decided to activate Sendcloud's WhatsApp tracking and review request messages to test their potential.
rossiRicambi.resultsText2: From one day to the next, Rossi Ricambi was able to massively send hundreds of WhatsApp messages with shipment updates and review requests. Unthinkable to do with the volume of shipments managed up to that point.
rossiRicambi.resultsResultText: Using Sendcloud's WhatsApp messages for 7 months, the Sicilian e-commerce literally exploded, collecting 5-star feedback one after another until reaching a total of 5390 reviews in 7 months. To get only 71 before Sendcloud had taken 5 years.
rossiRicambi.businessImpactText: Several industry studies have shown that having a page constantly populated with new reviews increases an e-commerce's orders by an average of 18%.
rossiRicambi.futureProspectsText1: The results obtained by Rossi Ricambi demonstrate once again how correct use of transactional notifications, especially those delivered via WhatsApp, can stimulate users to return to purchase again from the same e-commerce.
rossiRicambi.futureProspectsText2: After all, as highlighted by HBR.org, even just a 5% increase in customer retention is capable of generating a profit increase of 25% to 95%.
rossiRicambi.testimonialText: Good morning, nothing to complain about, material arrived in record time, well packaged, and conforming to the order, very much appreciated the notification and package tracking system also via WhatsApp, I will definitely continue to buy from Rossi ricambi, highly recommended.
rossiRicambi.ctaTitle: Want to increase your reviews with WhatsApp?
rossiRicambi.ctaText: Discover how Sendcloud can help you automate customer communications and significantly increase the number of positive reviews for your e-commerce.
rossiRicambi.benefit1Text: From 71 reviews in 5 years to 5390 reviews in just 7 months, an extraordinary increase thanks to automated WhatsApp messages.
rossiRicambi.benefit2Text: A 19% conversion rate demonstrates the effectiveness of WhatsApp communications in generating customer actions.
rossiRicambi.benefit3Text: The increase in positive reviews has led to an increase in orders and customer retention, with direct impact on profits.
